EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for joining us for Cloud-Native Advocate Tour
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for being part of this year’s Gartner Symposium/ITxpo. We hope you had the opportunity to stop by our booth and visit the many interesting sessions that explored the latest trends and technologies driving digital transformation, including our customer, Allianz’s, “Drive Business Value by Transforming Traditional Ops to Platform Product Teams.”
If you didn’t have a chance to benchmark your company’s performance in software delivery, you can view the overall results and fill out the questionnaire here. Pivotal’s platform, tools, and methodology help you deliver exceptional user experiences. Learn more by reading our O’Reilly-published, Thinking Architecturally ebook <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/thinking-architecturally?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-gartner-symposium-spain-q418]]>.
Take a look at our short keynote speaker video <[[https://content.pivotal.io/youtube-uberflip/keynote-pivotal-allianz-fireside-chat-rob-mee-ceo-pivotal-dr-andreas-nolte-cio-allianz?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=emea-event-gartner-symposium-spain-q418]]> to learn how Allianz’s senior management team took an agile, more customer-centric approach to it’s business by adopting Pivotal Cloud Foundry for digital transformation in the German insurance industry.
Thanks,
The Pivotal Team
